content.question: The passage is most likely excerpted from

choices.label: an educational article promoting awareness of a critical scientific issue
a scholarly essay substantiating the veracity of a recent scientific discovery
a historical document describing public funding for biodiversity studies
a research report criticizing the behavior of both sides in a current scientific debate

content.answer: an educational article promoting awareness of a critical scientific issue

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
